reviews.text: I stayed at Hotel Alpha-1 Toyama while visiting a friend in the area. It's practically right in front of the station, so it's very conveniently located. This was the first time I had stayed in an Alpha-1 hotel (it's a small chain). The rooms themselves are fairly standard for business hotels- they're small. They're also a great value. This hotel in particular was quite clean and has some standout amenities that many business hotels don't have. There's actually a large open bath on the top floor, with a pretty good view. At least for the men's side- I do not know if there is a bath of the same size for women. Most of the rooms in the hotel have their own shower, so the open bath is an extra perk.
reviews.title: Good business hotel conveniently located by the station
